title: Lost Research Station Adventure #20
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Quarantine Airlock
rooms.description: A sterile white chamber with red emergency lighting casting an ominous glow. Biohazard warnings flash on wall-mounted screens. The air is cold and smells of disinfectant. A decontamination shower stands in one corner, and a sealed locker is mounted on the wall. Through the reinforced window, you can see the main laboratory corridor.

items.name: decontamination shower
items.description: A chemical shower unit with various nozzles and controls

items.name: hazmat gloves
items.description: Heavy-duty protective gloves for handling dangerous materials

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A metal locker with two compartments labeled for emergency supplies

items.name: station status log
items.description: A digital tablet displaying the last status report
items.text: STATION LOG - Final Entry: Containment breach in Lab 2847. Dr. Chen and Dr. Webb have sealed themselves in the research wing. Project Exodus data must be retrieved from the mainframe. Emergency protocol: Security code is the breach lab number. - Station Director Hayes

items.name: level 2 security keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with Level 2 clearance markings

items.name: reinforced corridor door
items.description: A heavy security door with a card reader and biohazard seal

rooms.name: Main Laboratory Corridor
rooms.description: A long corridor with flickering fluorescent lights. Lab doors line both sides, most sealed with red lockdown indicators. Emergency signs point to various sections. A large bulletin board displays staff photos and research assignments. Broken glass and scattered papers litter the floor. The air is eerily quiet except for the hum of ventilation systems.

items.name: staff bulletin board
items.description: A board with photos and information about research staff
items.text: STAFF ASSIGNMENTS: Dr. Chen - Xenobiology, Lab 2847. Dr. Webb - Quantum Physics, Lab 2847. Dr. Hayes - Station Director, Administration. All personnel report to the research wing for Project Exodus briefings.

items.name: photo of Dr Chen
items.description: A staff photo showing a scientist in a lab coat
items.text: Dr. Sarah Chen - Lead Xenobiologist. Specializes in extraterrestrial organism research. Office: Research Wing, Room 12.

items.name: photo of Dr Webb
items.description: A staff photo of a physicist with safety goggles
items.text: Dr. Marcus Webb - Quantum Physicist. Project lead for dimensional gateway experiments. Office: Research Wing, Room 15.

items.name: photo of Director Hayes
items.description: A formal portrait of the station director
items.text: Director Elizabeth Hayes - Station Commander. Oversees all research operations and emergency protocols.

items.name: scattered research papers
items.description: Papers strewn across the floor, some stained and torn

items.name: urgent research memo
items.description: A crumpled memo marked URGENT
items.text: MEMO: Project Exodus nearing completion. The gateway requires three authentication factors: Director's authorization, lead scientist confirmation, and project designation. Gateway room access restricted to senior staff only. - Dr. Webb

items.name: emergency supply cabinet
items.description: A cabinet with medical and emergency supplies

items.name: emergency flashlight
items.description: A heavy-duty flashlight with fresh batteries

items.name: research wing security door
items.description: A blast door leading to the research wing. A terminal beside it displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: Enter Station Director surname:
password_questions.hint: Check the staff photos and station log

password_questions.question: Enter lead xenobiologist surname:
password_questions.hint: Look at the staff assignments on the bulletin board

password_questions.question: Enter containment breach lab number:
password_questions.hint: The station log mentions the breach location

rooms.name: Research Wing Central Hub
rooms.description: The heart of the research station. A circular room with multiple lab doors branching off. In the center stands a large holographic display showing a swirling dimensional gateway. Computer terminals line the walls, most still active and displaying data streams. A massive vault door dominates the far wall, marked with Project Exodus insignia. The room hums with residual energy.

items.name: gateway hologram
items.description: A 3D projection of a dimensional portal with technical readouts
items.text: PROJECT EXODUS: Dimensional Gateway Status - STANDBY. Activation requires: Director Hayes authorization, Dr. Chen biological clearance, Project Exodus designation code. WARNING: Gateway destination coordinates locked to safe zone.

items.name: main computer terminal
items.description: The primary research station computer with multiple access ports

items.name: gateway access protocol
items.description: A document detailing the gateway activation procedure
items.text: GATEWAY ACTIVATION PROTOCOL: Three-factor authentication required. Q1: Who authorized Project Exodus? Q2: Who led the xenobiology research? Q3: What is the project designation? All answers must be exact. Gateway provides escape route from contaminated station.

items.name: research station desk
items.description: A desk covered with data tablets and research notes

items.name: personnel file for Dr Chen
items.description: Official personnel record for the xenobiologist
items.text: Dr. Sarah Chen - Employee ID: XB-2847. Clearance Level: Senior Researcher. Project Assignment: Exodus - Xenobiology Division. Status: Active.

items.name: personnel file for Dr Webb
items.description: Official personnel record for the physicist
items.text: Dr. Marcus Webb - Employee ID: QP-1523. Clearance Level: Senior Researcher. Project Assignment: Exodus - Quantum Physics Division. Status: Active.

items.name: equipment storage rack
items.description: A rack holding various scientific instruments

items.name: encrypted data drive
items.description: A storage device containing critical research data
items.text: PROJECT EXODUS - CLASSIFIED: This drive contains all research data for the dimensional gateway project. Project designation: EXODUS. Keep secure at all times.

items.name: Project Exodus vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door with a biometric scanner and authentication terminal. The Project Exodus logo glows on its surface.

password_questions.question: Enter Director authorization name:
password_questions.hint: Check who authorized the project in the logs and photos

password_questions.question: Enter lead xenobiologist name:
password_questions.hint: Look at the personnel files and staff assignments

password_questions.question: Enter project designation:
password_questions.hint: The project name appears on multiple documents and the vault door

rooms.name: Dimensional Gateway Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the Project Exodus gateway! A massive circular portal dominates the room, its surface rippling with otherworldly energy. The gateway frame is covered in advanced technology and glowing conduits. Through the portal, you can see a safe research facility on the other side - your escape route. Control panels show all systems are green and ready for transit.

items.name: dimensional portal
items.description: A stable wormhole leading to safety, the culmination of years of research

items.name: gateway control panel
items.description: The master controls for the dimensional gateway
items.text: GATEWAY STATUS: ACTIVE. Destination: Safe Zone Research Facility Alpha. Transit ready. All personnel may evacuate through the gateway. Project Exodus is complete.

items.name: research archive terminal
items.description: A terminal containing all Project Exodus research data
items.text: PROJECT EXODUS COMPLETE: Dimensional gateway technology successfully developed. Station evacuation authorized due to containment breach. All research data secured. Gateway provides permanent escape route.

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have activated the Project Exodus dimensional gateway and secured the research data. The portal stabilizes before you, showing a safe facility on the other side. You step through the shimmering gateway and emerge in a clean, secure research station far from the contaminated facility. The lost research station's final mission is complete - you have escaped with the critical data that will save countless lives. You win!
